title: The buffs that Shaco should have received
body:
Reminder to the trash design team that shaco was toxic himself because he was feast or famine, so while your passive/Q nerfs were good to fixe his early game, you didn't do jackshit for him

Jack in the boxe:
-hp changed to 3 hit(smiting them still one-shot)
-delay reduced to 0.75 seconds
-fear range increased to 500 radius
-fear duration changed to 1---->1.5 seconds

Two-shiv poison:

-type of damage is now based on the highest ratio between AP or AD
-damaged unchanged
-slow % increased to 20--->30%

hallucination:
-if shaco uses two-shiv poison, the clone now casts a fake dagger that doesn't do anything
-if shaco uses jack in the boxe, the clone will faint to cast jack in the boxe while not summoning any boxes
-if shaco uses deceive, the clone will also use  deceive but won't have any bonus damage on the next attack
-delay is now 0.25--->0.5 seconds based on how long shaco keeps pressing R
-first attack of the clone deals 1/2 of the explosion damage, but will reduce the damage of the explosion by 1/2.
